bioconda.name: vsearch
bioconda.summary: A versatile open source tool for metagenomics (USEARCH alternative)

biocontainers.name: vsearch
biocontainers.summary: High-throughput search and clustering sequence analysis tool. it supports de novo and reference based chimera detection, clustering, full-length and prefix dereplication, reverse complementation, masking, all-vs-all pairwise global alignment, exact and global alignment searching, shuffling, subsampling and sorting. it also supports fastq file analysis, filtering and conversion.

biotools.summary: High-throughput search and clustering sequence analysis tool. It supports de novo and reference based chimera detection, clustering, full-length and prefix dereplication, reverse complementation, masking, all-vs-all pairwise global alignment, exact and global alignment searching, shuffling, subsampling and sorting. It also supports FASTQ file analysis, filtering and conversion.

bioschemas.name: VSEARCH
bioschemas.summary: High-throughput search and clustering sequence analysis tool. It supports de novo and reference based chimera detection, clustering, full-length and prefix dereplication, reverse complementation, masking, all-vs-all pairwise global alignment, exact and global alignment searching, shuffling, subsampling and sorting. It also supports FASTQ file analysis, filtering and conversion.

galaxy.summary: VSEARCH including searching, clustering, chimera detection, dereplication, sorting, masking and shuffling of sequences.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: High-throughput search and clustering sequence analysis tool. It supports de novo and reference based chimera detection, clustering, full-length and prefix dereplication, reverse complementation, masking, all-vs-all pairwise global alignment, exact and global alignment searching, shuffling, subsampling and sorting. It also supports FASTQ file analysis, filtering and conversion.
